bilingual.source: The new policy provides an incentive for people to save more money for retirement.
bilingual.target: 新政策为人们多存退休金提供了激励。

bilingual.source: The promise of a bonus is a strong incentive for employees to increase productivity.
bilingual.target: 奖金的承诺是员工提高生产力的强大激励。

bilingual.source: A good teacher knows how to use praise as an incentive for students to work harder.
bilingual.target: 好老师知道如何用表扬作为学生努力学习的激励。

bilingual.source: The government introduced tax breaks as an incentive for businesses to invest in green energy.
bilingual.target: 政府推出了税收优惠作为企业投资绿色能源的激励。

bilingual.source: The solution to this problem is not to try to use money as an incentive to do housework.
bilingual.target: 解决这个问题的办法是不要试图用金钱作为做家务的激励。

bilingual.source: The major policies are direct funding and tax incentive.
bilingual.target: 激励政策工具主要有直接资助和间接激励。

bilingual.source: There's a tax incentive to do that.
bilingual.target: 这里面还有一个税收激励因素

yingyinNormal.en: Incentive for Men? I'll take some of that. Phoebe, that's for men. I know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 男人的动机？我要喷一点。菲比，那是男生的香水，我知道。

yingyinNormal.en: But if we made an example of one or two, it might give the others incentive to try harder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但倘若我们拿一两位作为案例，或许能更好的鞭策他人努力学习呢。

yingyinNormal.en: And yet his incentive to flee is directly tied to the harshness of the sentencing guidelines.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么量刑指导的严厉性，将直接导致他有弃保潜逃的动机。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 激励; 动机; 刺激

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: thing that encourages someone to do something
sense_info_list.zh: 激励; 动机; 刺激

examination_example.sentence: There are also <highlight>incentive</highlight>-based ways of making better environmental choices easier, such as ensuring recycling is at least as easy as trash disposal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有一些基于激励的方法，可以让更好的环境选择变得更简单，比如确保回收利用至少和垃圾处理一样容易。

examination_example.sentence: On this, students' and colleges' <highlight>incentives</highlight> seem to be aligned.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一点上，学生和大学的动机似乎是一致的。

examination_example.sentence: Nostalgia for ink on paper and the rustle of pages aside, there's plenty of <highlight>incentive</highlight> to ditch print.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 抛开对纸上墨水和书页沙沙声的怀念，放弃印刷有充足的动机。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: thing that encourages someone to do something

examination_example.sentence: People respond to <highlight>incentives</highlight> such as traffic laws that are actually enforced.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们对实际执行的交通法规等激励做出反应。

examination_example.sentence: The solution lies not just in better infrastructure, but in better social <highlight>incentives</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解决方案不仅在于更好的基础设施，而且在于更好的社会激励。

examination_example.sentence: A stronger relationship between the retailer/producer and the consumer isn't just about financial <highlight>incentives</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 增进零售商/生产商和消费者之间的关系不仅仅是靠经济激励。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: thing that encourages someone to do something

examination_example.sentence: The solution to this problem is not to try to use money as an <highlight>incentive</highlight> to do housework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解决这个问题的办法是不要试图用金钱作为做家务的激励。

examination_example.sentence: They need a little <highlight>incentive</highlight> to get involved in housework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们需要一点动力来参与家务。

examination_example.sentence: There needs to be strong economic <highlight>incentives</highlight> for companies to locate here.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要有强有力的经济激励措施，才能让企业在这里落户。
